snippet: With only sporadic access to text messaging and the Web, many in Hurricane Sandy's no-power zone quickly cobbled together systems for passing along information and arranging when and where to meet.
abstract: With only sporadic access to text messaging and the Web, many in Hurricane Sandy's no-power zone quickly cobbled together systems for passing along information and arranging when and where to meet.

headline.main: How New Yorkers Adjusted to Sudden Smartphone Withdrawal
headline.print_headline: City Life Goes On Without Cellphones in the No-Power Zone
